resources.string: This app-version is not a full release. This is a beta version so it could be unstable and things can lead this app to crash. Report issues if possible.\nThank you for testing this application!
Exercises, you need to finish today
Please select a user in Settings first, to use this feature.
There was an error while reading the file. Try again.
This is a Home Harmony-file extension but it is not the correct extension for the members. Please use a file, which extension is .hhm.
This is not a Home Harmony file. Please select a file, which extension is .hhm.
You can create a new file yourself by clicking on \"Add exercise\" and open a file, that includes exercises, by clicking on \"From File\".
This is a Home Harmony-file extension but it is not the correct extension for exercises. Please use a file, which extension is .hhe.
This is not a Home Harmony file. Please select a file, which extension is .hhe.
This can\'t be used as it seems like there are no exercises.
This is an overview, that is made for a quicker view on member\'s exercises.

Rulebook include rules but since you have not created a rule, there is no file yet. To create a rule, simply press on \"Add rule\" and choose whether you like to create a new rule or to add rules from a file.

Exercises include exercises but since you have not created an exercise, there is no file yet. To create a exercise, simply press on \"Add exercise\" and choose whether you like to create a new exercise or to add exercise from a file. Then, an exercise will be created.
There is no file, that includes rules. Either you have not create a rule yet, or this unexpected. However, to create a new rule, simply press on Add rule.
There is no file, that includes exercises. Either you have not create an exercise yet, or this unexpected. However, to create a new exercise, simply press on "Add exercise"
Choose from file or make own?
If you have a file, that contains rules, feel free to implement it. Your current rules will get deleted.
Rule must include title and message
This is a Home Harmony-file extension but it is not the correct extension for rules. Please use a file, which extension is .hhr.
This is not a Home Harmony file. Please select a file, which extension is .hhr
This is a feature that has yet to be implemented
